alert.note: Alert for Dent; Maries; Miller; Morgan; Oregon; Phelps; Pulaski; Shannon (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 18 at 7:27PM CDT until July 19 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM CDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...Portions of central, east central, and south central Missouri, including the following counties, in central Missouri, Maries, Miller, Morgan and Pulaski. In east central Missouri, Phelps. In south central Missouri, Dent, Oregon and Shannon. * WHEN...Until 7 AM CDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Low-water crossings may be flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Showers and thunderstorms are expected to develop across central Missouri around midnight Tuesday night then gradually shift southeast. Training storms may lead to excessive rainfall, especially in areas that saw excessive rainfall during the day Tuesday. The exact track of storms and resulting rainfall remain uncertain at this time. Stay tuned to updates and potential warnings Tuesday night into Wednesday morning. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Dent; Maries; Miller; Morgan; Oregon; Phelps; Pulaski; Shannon
